text: The system shall respond to search queries within 500 milliseconds.
The system should be user-friendly.
The login page shall load in under 2 seconds on a 4G connection.
The system should handle many users simultaneously.
The API shall return HTTP 200 for successful requests and HTTP 400 for invalid input.
The software must be of high quality.
The system shall support at least 1000 concurrent users without degradation.
The system should be reliable.
The password must be at least 12 characters and contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.
The system should perform well under stress.
The database backup shall complete within 30 minutes for databases up to 100GB.
The application should look professional.
The system shall achieve 99.9% uptime measured monthly.
The system should be easy to learn.
File upload shall accept JPEG and PNG files between 10KB and 5MB.
The system should be scalable.
The search shall return a maximum of 20 results per page sorted by relevance score.
The system must ensure data integrity.
The session shall timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity.
The interface should be attractive.
The API rate limiter shall block requests exceeding 100 per minute per API key.
The system should be maintainable.
Email notifications shall be delivered within 60 seconds of the triggering event.
The system should have good performance.
The export function shall generate a CSV file with UTF-8 encoding and comma separators.
The system must be robust.
The image compression shall reduce file size by at least 50% while maintaining SSIM above 0.95.
The system should be efficient.
The two-factor authentication code shall expire after 30 seconds.
The system should be secure.
The auto-save feature shall save document changes every 60 seconds.
The system should be flexible.
The checkout process shall complete in no more than 5 steps.
The system should be portable.
The dashboard shall refresh data every 60 seconds via WebSocket connection.
The system should have a nice design.
The PDF report shall not exceed 10 pages and shall include a table of contents.
The system should be fast.
The system shall hash passwords using bcrypt with a cost factor of 12.
The application should be stable.
The error message shall display within 1 second and include an error code and description under 200 characters.
The system should minimize downtime.
The pagination shall display page numbers and allow navigation to first, previous, next, and last pages.
The system should be adaptable.
The log retention policy shall keep entries for exactly 365 days before automatic deletion.
The system should handle errors gracefully.
The health check endpoint shall return JSON with status field and respond within 1 second.
The system should support future growth.
The CAPTCHA shall require users to solve a challenge after 3 consecutive failed login attempts.
The system should be cost-effective.

For those payloads identified in Table 3-2, the TCS shall be able to generate payload planning information to be uplinked to the AV separate from a flight route plan. [SSS103] The TCS shall provide the system functionality necessary to generate a payload plan that, as a minimum, shall include the following information: [SSS104]
2.2.14     The composition of call groups shall be able to be modified within the network. A  single user shall be able to be a member of one or more call groups. (M)
Within the braking curve area, a warning shall be given to the driver to enable him to react and avoid intervention from ETCS equipment at least 5 sec. before the intervention.
The subject of a specimen/sample collected for laboratory testing must be linked to the specimen/sample by an identifier (i.e., Subject ID) that is unique within the jurisdiction.
Within each GSM-R network, each Train Number shall be unique for the period of the journey. (M)
The equipment shall be capable of coping with temperature variations of up to +/- 1°C/minute. (M)
The duration of each tone (see 8.3.2 and 8.3.4) added in the voice channel, shall be 70ms ± 5ms, and there shall be a minimum gap of 65ms between each tone. (M)
The distance between a train following another train shall be equal to or greater than the braking distance of the following train.
3.4.3     Call set-up times for 99% of cases shall not be more than 1.5 times the required call set- up time. (M)
The Member States need to update the mapping in case of any change within a short time frame               (e.g. five days after a legal change has been put into force).
REQ-1: Query times will take no longer than 5 seconds to any website.
The user must associate at least one role, division, designator code, and lab location at the time of creating/adding a new user.

3.5.2     The  group  or  broadcast  call  area  used  will  have  the  effect  of  determining  which  mobiles can participate in the call (ie those currently within the area defined). It shall  be  possible  to  determine  the  area  over  which  the  call  takes  place  by  one,  or  a  combination, of the following: (M)
Claim Amount will capture Second Follow up Fee (from VSP Payment terms) +  (Qty of drugs * Retails Price (from Drugs Master)

The system shall perform a search in the Active Directory to verify the status of the user — Active/Inactive within the company—when the user attempts to create/add a new user in the [system name] system.
REQ-2: Sending the hyperlink to the default browser will take less than 1 second.
The detector LAN is also based on Ethernet, at least for the development systems.   A solution meeting the performance requirements of the ﬁnal system is to be  decided later.
The requirements specify the requirements to control the user access to correspondences, files, and records and various functionalities provided within the system.
If acknowledgement is specified the driver shall acknowledge transfer from Full Supervision to Partial Supervision within 5 seconds

The TCS shall provide an internal interface for establishing communications with the Real Time Processor (RTP) within TCS. [SSS326] This interface shall allow the information from the data server to be made available to other components of the TCS. [SSS327] The RTP interface shall support distributed processing capability. [SSS328] The RTP interface requirements and specifications will be defined in the Data Server IDD, TCS 238.
12.3.1     The maximum length of a message segment shall be 96 characters. A message can  include several segments. (M)
The train shall, as a minimum, be supervised to a ceiling speed; the supervised speed shall not be shown on the DMI unless selected by the driver.
The Operational radio shall conform to IP 54 [IEC 529/EN 60529] as a minimum. (M)

Figure 3.4-1 illustrates the TCS internal interfaces.  Except for the internal interfaces enumerated under this section, all TCS internal interfaces are left to the design and to the requirement specifications for system components. The TCS will provide, as a minimum, the following internal interfaces:
Warm start-up, starting from scratch but also excluding software download time  should take about 1 minute.
The support solution should be accessible to the users both from within the application and also outside the application through a browser interface.
All control software must provide support for simulated use  within the virtual telescope
2.4.9     Any user who is not within the list of allowed EIRENE users shall not be able to gain  access to any of the functions and services provided by the network. (M)  Call forwarding
2.3.8     The network shall support data rates of at least 2.4 kbit/s. (M)

The TCS shall have the capability to command the AV to use the navigation methods inherent to the selected AV. [SSS130] The operator shall have the capability to initiate as well as change, to include as a minimum manual override, UAV navigation methods by sending the proper control commands to the UAV. [SSS131]

End User Mode: Portion of XS services shall be used by various classes of  users: data consumers, data and database managers, network information infrastructure  resource managers. Some of these uses of the data management services will entail  unique requirements that shall be fulfilled within the capability of XS services.

There should be a full telescope simulator to enable the astronomer  to test observing programs for completeness, errors, and functionality. This simulator  should function within the virtual telescope environment of the Gemini system.
The aerial and any other equipment mounted external to the train shall function correctly during rapid temperature fluctuations of up to 3°C/second. (M)
11.3.3.3 It shall be possible to deregister up to ten functional numbers to items of equipment     physically connected to the Cab radio within 30 seconds. (M)
9.2.5.1     Group  call  service  areas  shall  be  freely  configurable  within  the  operational  responsibility of each railway network. (M)

Showing users where they are: Each presentation segment (page or window) should provide the user with a clear and sufficient indication of where he or she is in the navigation structure and of the current segment position with respect to the overall structure.
The right granularity and consistency of criteria MUST be found through testing and iterative redefinition               in order to ensure legitimacy and to retrieve adequate mapping results.
If the service requirements are acceptable according to the provider’s policy, mediator passes it to the local PA.
The system shall be easy to upgrade.
The system shall prompt customer with friend easy to read error messages.

Testability shall be considered in the design and development of the TCS. [SSS421] The system shall be functionally and physically partitioned to allow for efficient fault isolation. [SSS422] Control over internal items and devices shall be provided for detecting and isolating internal faults. [SSS423] Test points and data paths shall be defined to support efficient fault isolation. [SSS424]
Upon switch on, once the radio is connected to a mobile network, it shall be able to receive all calls made using the MSISDN or appropriate group call number. (M)
The economic operator is not supported in retrieving and collecting the required attestations from             the appropriate bodies;

WP2 SHOULD provide easy solutions for transforming the contents of context specific evidence into simple context specific representations (e.g. a Balance sheet can have several values but an easy representation could be the fulfilment of certain ranges for example below 1 Million / from 1 Million to 10 / …).
Linking back to the home page or landmark pages: Each page should contain a link leading to the home page of the application or to a landmark page that is easy to recognize for the user.

Verification of requirements will be accomplished by the use of appropriate combinations of inspections, analyses, demonstrations and tests. The method to be used for verification of each requirement is identified in Appendix B. The following defines verification methods as used in this specification:
The Cab radio should be capable of selecting the most appropriate mobile radio network automatically using the selection criteria stated in section 10.5. (O)
